value:
$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Oh, my father? He's the chieftain of
the Lorca tribe. He's really strong,
but a man of few words.$k$pWe don't talk all that much, actually.
Oh, and my mother! She's the picture
of grace with perfect manners.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ルセア,ch03_11_Ruthea_M_Before01,Face|They sound like wonderful parents.
You're lucky to have them, Lyn.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Too true! It must be nice to be
surrounded by your whole family...$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Yeah... Talking about my parents
reminds me how proud I am of them
and my Sacaen heritage.$k$pI forgot that feeling when I lost my
cool after a snooty noble laughed at
me earlier.$k$pMy parents would be disappointed in
how I responded. They wouldn't have
let the comment bother them.$k$pWhat's that, Mark? You think cool
heads should always win the day?
I can definitely agree with that.$k$pI'll make sure to find Eliwood later
and apologize to him... Hector too.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Heh. Guess they're so busy having a
nice chat that they don't even notice
we're standing right here.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|I'm just happy to see that she and
Mark have found like-minded allies.$k$pIt seems we could learn from them
when it comes to making friends.
Why don't we get some practice?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Hey, Lyn! Mark!$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Huh?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|If you have the time, would you mind
teaching us about the plains of Sacae
and your tribe?$k$pWe'd also like to hear how Mark's
tactical studies are going.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|What's with this sudden interest?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|I'm sure you're aware that Hector
and I will be involved in positions
of power when we grow up.$k$pLearning as much as we can about
the rest of the world to prepare now
would be a great help.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|All we really know are the places we
grew up in. Outside of that? Nothing.
You've gotta help us out!$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Are you...trying to make up for what
happened earlier?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Er, well... When you put it like that,
I guess... Ugh, I'm no good at this
sort of stuff...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Lyn. While it is true that you were
raised in a different environment than
we were...$k$pPlease know that we don't consider
you any less smart than us. Not by a
long shot.$k$pNo two people live out identical
experiences or think in the exact
same ways.$k$pIt's in recognizing those differences
that we can see their true value.$k$pI want to bring Pherae—in fact, the
whole world—around to that mindset.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Eliwood...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Whew! Seems like I channeled my
father there for a bit. What did you
think, Hector?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|You certainly know how to give a
speech. I don't, so you can take care
of all the talking from here on, pal.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Seeing as you want to make amends,
I want to bring up something too...$k$pI let something silly get under my skin
when I shouldn't have, and that's no
excuse, so... I'm sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|It's all right. Water under the bridge
and all.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|I'm glad to see that we're all agreed
on starting fresh.$k$pWith that in mind, Lyn, Mark... I hope
we will become the best of friends.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|As do we! I think there are great
things ahead for all of us.$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|
